description: A 100 round magazine for assault rifles that utilize the 19mm round or similar ammunition.
A single drum 100 round magazine for the CBJ_MS PDW.
//: The 6.5x25mm cartridge can be fired in a 9mm mag, however not vice-versa.  This mag is actually only for the 6.5x25mm cartridge but since the CBJ-MS is the only weapon that fires that cartridge I'm going to skirt realism and change it to accept the 9mm cartridge. See modern_smg.json-cbj_ms

description: A standard 30-round, translucent plastic, box magazine for submachine guns.
A 34 round capacity mag for the Sterling submachine gun. It is slightly curved, double-stacked, with twin rollers for positive feeding.
